mapper.insert: insert into u_db (u_id, u_pw, u_na, u_phone, u_gen, u_bir, u_em, u_reg, u_out, a_idx, u_outr, u_kakao, u_naver) value (#{u_id}, #{u_pw}, #{u_na}, #{u_phone}, #{u_gen}, #{u_bir}, #{u_em}, DATE(NOW()), #{u_out}, #{a_idx}, #{u_outr}, #{u_kakao}, #{u_naver})
mapper.select: select u_id from u_db where u_id=#{u_id}
select u_id from u_db where u_em=#{u_em}
select u_kakao from u_db where u_kakao=#{u_kakao}
